A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Damn I am quite disappointed by this installment. Many plot lines that were built up from The Force Awakens were simply thrown out the window. Two prominent antagonist died in the most retarded ways. The movie has several big plot holes and several quite cringy moments such as Leia flying through space or Rey beating Luke and the Imperial Guard with ZERO training.

Also Luke's character was abysmal. From throwing his father's lightsaber behind his back at the start to becoming one with the force out of no where with no context or anything at the end of the movie.

The high ratings given by critics at metacritic and rottentomatoes are extremely suspicious. Did the critics get paid for those praising reviews.......?
